title: Paiva (João de)
body: João de Paiva de Faria Leite Brandão was appointed Civil Governor of this district by decree of February 22, 1908, having taken office on March 9 of the same year.

João de Paiva de Faria Leite Brandão: Appointed Civil Governor of the district.

1908: Year in which João de Paiva de Faria Leite Brandão was appointed Civil Governor.
